channel.title: Summoning Pets!
channel.description: Hey I have a lot of pets on my server, I'm running 317 PI. And for some reason I can't summon them to follow me, I try dropping them and it says "item cannot be dropped" and then use does nothing...

item.title: Summoning Pets!
item.dc:creator: @J_for_jawsh J for jawsh
item.description:
@J_for_jawsh wrote:

Hey I have a lot of pets on my server, I’m running 317 PI. And for some reason I can’t summon them to follow me, I try dropping them and it says “item cannot be dropped” and then use does nothing…

Read full topic
